about_the_game:
In this demo you play through the first town

Unending nightfall has swept across the forest, sending all the animals fleeing from monstrous shapes in the dark!

A last refuge, Light Springs, survives; and now it's time for you to chart the lost paths back into the forest!

Collect and use charms and glyphs of power to make your way through the forest, reconnect villages and help towns-critters as you work to solve the cause of the nightfall.

Explore: The forest is dark and filled with danger! Find the safest path for convoys to travel, and uncover long forgotten locations to help your journey!

Customise: Grow your loadout of glyphs, and make strategic upgrades to them as you travel.
